name: darvin-boilerplate
description: html5 webpack boilerplate for modern browsers with loader ecosystem, preview for shipping and cli scaffolding.

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SCRIPT_ENV=modern DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack-dev-server --hot --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-bundle: npm run prev-prod; cross-env SCRIPT_ENV=modern NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-bundle-system: npm run prev-prod; cross-env SCRIPT_ENV=modern NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.prod webpack --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.prev-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack --mode development --config  webpack/webpack.preview.js --watch
scripts.prev-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack --mode production --config  webpack/webpack.preview.js
scripts.prod: npm run prev-prod; cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.prod-modern: cross-env SCRIPT_ENV=modern NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.modern.js
scripts.prod-modern-system: cross-env SCRIPT_ENV=modern NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.prod webpack --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.modern.js
scripts.prod-system: npm run prev-prod; cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.prod webpack --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.prod-with-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.modern DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.dev webpack-dev-server --hot --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.start: npm install -g cross-env; npm install; npm run prev-prod; npm run dev
